scripts.deploy:goerli-staging: dotenv -- cross-var yarn manifest:goerli && graph deploy corantin/govern-goerli-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token %THE_GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN%
